comments.author: julian.reschke@gmx.de
comments.text:
See test case at

  http://greenbytes.de/tech/tc2231/#attbrokenquotedfn2

This sends

  Content-Disposition: attachment; filename="bar

Note the missing double quote. Opera and Konqueror correctly ignore the header field as broken. FF could align with that, or minimally, ignore the filename parameter.

(This is for consistency with implementations with stricter parsers)
comments.creator: julian.reschke@gmx.de
comments.raw_text:
See test case at

  http://greenbytes.de/tech/tc2231/#attbrokenquotedfn2

This sends

  Content-Disposition: attachment; filename="bar

Note the missing double quote. Opera and Konqueror correctly ignore the header field as broken. FF could align with that, or minimally, ignore the filename parameter.

(This is for consistency with implementations with stricter parsers)
